name: Grocery Shopping
todo: Buy groceries for the week, including fruits, vegetables, bread, and milk.

name: Clean the House
todo: Clean the living room, bedroom, and kitchen. Vacuum the floors and dust the furniture. Clean the bathroom and scrub the toilet and sink.

name: Go for a Run
todo: Put on running shoes and run for 30 minutes around the neighborhood. Stretch before and after the run to prevent injury.

name: Learn React
todo: Complete a tutorial on React and build a simple application using React components.

name: Call Mom
todo: Call Mom to catch up and see how she's doing. Ask about her day and tell her about yours.

name: Write a Blog Post
todo: Choose a topic and write a blog post of at least 500 words. Edit the post for grammar and clarity.

name: Practice Guitar
todo: Practice playing guitar for at least 30 minutes. Focus on a new chord or song to learn.

name: Cook Dinner
todo: Plan and prepare a healthy dinner for the evening. Look up new recipes or try an old favorite.

name: Read a Book
todo: Choose a book and read for at least 30 minutes. Make note of any interesting or inspiring passages.

name: Take a Walk
todo: Go for a walk around the block or in a nearby park. Enjoy the fresh air and scenery.

name: Study Spanish
todo: Spend at least 30 minutes studying Spanish. Use a textbook, app, or online resource to practice vocabulary and grammar.

name: Call a Friend
todo: Call a friend or family member you haven't spoken to in a while. Catch up on each other's lives and make plans to get together.

name: Learn a New Skill
todo: Choose a skill you've always wanted to learn and spend at least 30 minutes practicing it. This could be anything from coding to knitting to juggling.

name: Do Yoga
todo: Do a 30-minute yoga routine to stretch and relax your body. Focus on your breath and let go of any stress or tension.

name: Watch a TED Talk
todo: Find an interesting TED Talk and watch it. Take notes and reflect on what you learned from the talk.
